sense.name: Make an impression, carving, or (artistic) copy of; make a reproduction of written material.
sense.examples: He etched her image into the surface. He etched the shape of the letter on the surface of the printing block. Etch the pen with the owner's name.

sense.name: Cause to stand out or be clearly defined or visible.
sense.examples: The sunset etched the leafless branches against the sky. The wounds etched pain across her face.

sense.name: Selectively dissolve the surface of (a semiconductor or printed circuit) with a solvent, laser, or stream of electrons.
sense.examples: The factory etches circuits. Electrons etch circuit pathways.
